PERSONA:
meet alex, a 35-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. alex is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and comes from a middle-income family, earning between $90,000 and $100,000 per year.

alex identifies as a very liberal democrat and is deeply engaged in political and social issues. he is an avid internet user, frequently going online several times a day to stay informed and connected. despite his busy life, alex finds time to volunteer, driven by a strong sense of civic duty and a desire to give back to his community.

while alex was born and raised in the u.s., he does not identify with any particular religious affiliation and considers himself unaffiliated or "nothing in particular" when it comes to religion. he seldom attends religious services.

in his personal life, alex is married and values his relationship deeply. he enjoys spending quality time with his spouse and cherishes the companionship and support they provide each other.

overall, alex is a well-educated, socially conscious, and politically engaged individual who strikes a balance between his professional and personal commitments while staying true to his liberal values and community-oriented mindset.
